Annotation.String: The RootOfTrust schema describes the Google root of trust device, located at the '/google/v1/Chassis/RootOfTrust' URI.
This Resource represents the Google root of trust device. All values that this schema describes for Resources shall comply with the Google Specification-described requirements.
The version of the root of trust device.
This property shall represent the Google root of trust protocol version.
The available actions for this resource.
This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
This action sends commands to root of trust.
This action shall send arbitrary commands to root of trust.
The bytes to forward to the root of trust device.
This parameter shall contain the bytes to be forwarded to the root of trust device. The string should be space delimited hexadecimal, for instance, '0x0 0x0 0x0' or '0x1 0x2 0x3'.
The bytes returned by the root of trust device.
This return value shall contain the bytes returned by the root of trust device. The string should be space delimited hexadecimal, for instance, '0x0 0x0 0x0' or '0x1 0x2 0x3'.
